title: Can we change the "None" ban option to "Pass" please?
body: If my teammate can't think of anyone worth a ban, can someone else on the team use it instead?  I don't care who gets it.  It's just such a waste, given that four other people would be happy to make the choice in their place.

replies.body: I honestly just hate people who ban 'none'
I had a "friend" who would do it just to piss everyone playing off. Like there is no reason not to ban someone you don't want on the other team it's pointless.

There is absolutely a reason to vote "None" sometimes in solo queue drafts.

Your ban choice is often a signifier of what lane you plan to play.  

This can give information to the opposing team about where positions are in the draft order, and who is able to counterpick the opposing position.

By denying this information, you make it harder for the opposing team to plan their composition, particularly before your own champion choice is revealed.

It's rare that the utility of this strategy outweighs a ban against your worst matchup  - but I've seen it used effectively, and done it myself before when on a particularly meta-favored champion with relatively few bad matchups.
